link.title: Lincoln Park Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: ALL STUDENTS ARE ELIGIBLE FOR FREE LUNCH. Pick up is available at the LPMS on Mondays and Wednesdays from 10:30-12 Noon.

strong.span: The Office of Emergency Management has provided new guidance for individuals tested for COVID-19. Please check out the following links:

p.span: Congratulations to Mrs. Guza, LPMS Math Teacher! She has been recognized as one of New Jersey's best teachers.
